strapiPost.title: A Preview Of The Aronson Lifestyle Tonight At The 112 Drive-In
strapiPost.content:
Alamo Drafthouse will host a special event tonight to commemorate the transformation of the 112 Drive-In with a screening of Universal Pictures' Cocaine Bear.

  • Movie-ing on: The new development from ITEX, called The Aronson, will replace the locally-beloved 112 Drive-In with modern amenities while preserving the spirit of the iconic film destination that served NWA for 42 years.
  • Film legend: Named after cinema pioneer and Arkansas-native Max Aronson, the cinema-inspired development will include over 200 multifamily units, a retail destination, and Arkansas's first Alamo Drafthouse Cinema + Drive-In. 

Learn more about The Aronson in About You HERE.
